mention.text: a shotgun , as well as empty shell boxes , in a dumpster outside lacalamita 's apartment monday
a shotgun , as well as empty shell boxes
anthony lacalamita iii , 38 , targeted two managers and also
a general accountant at the firm
steinberg , a partner in the firm
the office of paul riva , another partner
lacalamita shot riva in the upper chest , then
first - degree murder in the death of kafoury , 63 , and intent
degree murder in the death of kafoury , 63 , and intent
the judge if he understood the charges against him and if he was aware that he could be sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole if convicted of first - degree murder
real estate records obtained by the associated press
the families of the wounded men
